title: Quarkus 1.10.3.Final released - Bugfixes
content: 1.10.3.Final is a maintenance release fixing bugs and improving the documentation. Thanks to all the contributors who reported issues and provided reproducers: it really helped a lot! It is a safe upgrade for everyone using Quarkus 1.10. If you are not using 1.10 already, please refer to the 1.10 migration...
